markdownRemark.excerpt: Tech stack Node.js, React.js, Redux, Socker.IO, CircleCI, Jest, Docker URL https://github.com/agustinaliagac/crawl-io
markdownRemark.html:
This application consists in an e-commerce scraper (it crawls across multiple websites in parallel). The back end is a Node.js app, and the front end is React.js/Redux. You can read more about it in the repo itself. It includes: - Front end (creating components, redux stores, thunks, websockets, basic UI with material-UI, basic navigation) - Back end (Node.js app, REST endpoints) - Scrapers (JS based with X-Ray) - Basic unit tests in both ends with Jest and Mocha - CI/CD flow with CircleCI and Docker

Tech stack

Node.js, React.js, Redux, Socker.IO, CircleCI, Jest, Docker

URL

https://github.com/agustinaliagac/crawl-io
